Class E3AGameSpecificRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.gamebinding.EresseaGameSpecificRules
      • magellan.library.gamebinding.e3a.E3AGameSpecificRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameSpecificRules
    public class E3AGameSpecificRules
extends EresseaGameSpecificRules
    This class implements all Eressea specific rule informations.
    Version:
    1.0, 19.04.2009
    Author:
    Thoralf Rickert

      • isPooled

        public boolean isPooled​(Unit unit,
                        StringID typeID)
        Returns true. Material and silver pools are always active in E3.
        Specified by:
        isPooled in interface GameSpecificRules
        Overrides:
        isPooled in class EresseaGameSpecificRules
        typeID - May be null. In that case, the status of the general material pool is returned.
        Returns:
        true if the unit can access the pool for the type.
        See Also:
        EresseaGameSpecificRules.isPooled(magellan.library.Unit, magellan.library.StringID)
